part.name: The Fairy
part.info: Frevia, an elven shyde with home in a glade east of Aris, has asked you to find her missing fairy. She has suggested to look near a small lake south of the glade.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Oh, hello there, wandering stranger! You're welcome to stay a while and rest in my glade, if you like.
However, I do have to ask... Have you, by any chance, seen my little fairy? She has been missing for a while now, and I'm beginning to worry...

response.message: You seem to have a few fairies around right here.

dialog.name: havefairies
dialog.message: Oh no, I don't mean these!
{npc.name} the elven shyde giggles softly to herself.
This one was... special, shall we say... always had a mind of her own, bit tomboyish really.

dialog.name: lookfor
dialog.message: You would! Thank you, kind {self.gender2}!
I think my little fairy has taken a liking to the small lake south of my glade, near a large waterfall. Perhaps she will be around there...

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you found my little fairy yet, kind {self.gender2}?

dialog.name: working

response.message: Are you one of Frevia's fairies?

dialog.name: oneof
dialog.message: Humpf, what if I am?!

dialog.name: lookingfor
dialog.message: Oh, is she now!
There's no reason to be worried about me...
{npc.name} grins mischievously.
Tell Frevia she needn't worry about me. I'll be around the glade from time to time...

part.name: Report to Frevia
part.info: You have found the fairy safe and sound, exactly where Frevia said she would be. You should report the good news to Frevia.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you found my little fairy yet, kind {self.gender2}?

response.message: Yes, she's safe and sound at the lake.

dialog.name: safe
dialog.message: Ah, I see! Thank you, I appreciate your kindness, dear {self.gender2}. It will be nice to see her again from time to time, like I said, she's a bit of a rebel...
As a token of my gratitude, please accept this flower from me. As you may know, flowers are a powerful symbol among the elves, but the flowers from this glade are even more special...
